text: This article lists the main modern pentathlon events and their results for 2009. ==2010 YOG qualification events== * October 1 – 5: YOG 2010 Continental Qualifier - Europe in BudapestUIPM's YOG 2010 Continental Qualifier - Europe Results Page ** Youth Individual winners: Pawel Golik (m) / Zsófia Földházi (f) ** Youth Team Relay winner: Alexandra Savvina * December 3 – 6: YOG 2010 Continental Qualifier - Pan America in Buenos AiresUIPM's YOG 2010 Continental Qualifier - Pan America Results Page ** Youth Individual winners: Andrei Gheorghe (m) / Yane Marques (f) * December 5: YOG 2010 Qualifier in Buenos AiresUIPM's YOG 2010 Qualifier Results Page ** Youth Individual winners: Jorge Abraham Camacho (m) / Tamara Vega (f) * December 18 – 20: YOG 2010 Continental Qualifier - Asia & Oceania in UIPM's YOG 2010 Continental Qualifier - Asia & Oceania Results Page ** Youth Individual winners: PARK Sang-gu (m) / ZHU Wenjing (f) ==World modern pentathlon championships== * July 6 – 12: 2009 World Junior Modern Pentathlon Championships in KaohsiungUIPM's 2009 World Junior Modern Pentathlon Championships Results Page ** Junior Individual winners: AHN Ji-hun (m) / Aya Medany (f) ** Junior Team Relay winners: AHN Ji- hun (m) / Janine Kohlmann (f) ** Junior Mixed winner: Yang Soo-jin * July 22 – 27: 2009 World Youth "A" Modern Pentathlon Championships in CairoUIPM's 2009 World Youth "A" Modern Pentathlon Championships Results Page ** Youth Individual winners: Gergely Demeter (m) / Zsófia Földházi (f) ** Youth Team Relay winners: KIM Soeng-jin (m) / Zsófia Földházi (f) ** Youth Mixed winner: GUO Jing * August 11 – 19: 2009 World Modern Pentathlon Championships in LondonUIPM's 2009 World Modern Pentathlon Championships Results Page ** Individual winners: Ádám Marosi (m) / Chen Qian (f) ** Mixed Team Relay winners: (David Svoboda & Lucie Grolichová) ==Continental modern pentathlon championships== * April 28 – May 3: 2009 European Junior Modern Pentathlon Championships in AlbenaUIPM's 2009 European Junior Modern Pentathlon Championships Results Page ** Junior Individual winners: Maxim Kuznetsov (m) / Sarolta Kovács (f) ** Junior Team Relay winners: Remigiusz Golis (m) / Sarolta Kovács (f) ** Junior Mixed winner: Natalie Dianová * June 5 – 7: 2009 NORCECA Modern Pentathlon Championships in Palm SpringsUIPM's 2009 NORCECA Modern Pentathlon Championships Results Page ** Individual winners: Dennis Bowsher (m) / Margaux Isaksen (f) * June 7 – 13: 2009 Asian Modern Pentathlon Championships in SeoulUIPM's 2009 Asian Modern Pentathlon Championships Results Page ** Individual winners: Jung Jin-hwa (m) / Xiu Xiu (f) ** Team Relay winners: Shinichi Tomii (m) / (Chen Qian & ZHU Wenjing) (f) * June 25 – 30: 2009 European Modern Pentathlon Championships in LeipzigUIPM's 2009 European Modern Pentathlon Championships Results Page ** Individual winners: Ondřej Polívka (m) / Amélie Cazé (f) ** Team Relay winners: Edvinas Krungolcas (m) / Lucie Grolichová (f) * July 1 – 5: 2009 European Youth "B" Modern Pentathlon Championships in AbrantesUIPM's 2009 European Youth "B" Modern Pentathlon Championships Results Page ** Youth Individual winners: Michal Gralewski (m) / Zsófia Földházi (f) ** Youth Team Relay winners: Michal Gralewski (m) / Zsófia Földházi (f) ==2009 Modern Pentathlon World Cup== * March 24 – 29: MPWC #1 in Mexico CityUIPM's 2009 MPWC #1 Results Page ** Note: This event was supposed to be held in Palm Springs, but it was cancelled. ** Individual winners: Marcin Horbacz (m) / Aya Medany (f) * April 16 – 19: MPWC #2 in CairoUIPM's 2009 MPWC #2 Results Page ** Individual winners: Ondřej Polívka (m) / Laura Asadauskaitė (f) * May 7 – 10: MPWC #3 for Men in BudapestUIPM's 2009 MPWC #3 for Men Result Page ** Winner: Deniss Čerkovskis * May 14 – 17: MPWC #3 for Women in SzékesfehérvárUIPM's 2009 MPWC #3 for Women Result Page ** Winner: Laura Asadauskaitė * May 20 – 25: MPWC #4 in RomeUIPM's 2009 MPWC #4 Results Page ** Individual winners: Ilia Frolov (m) / Aya Medany (f) * September 11 – 13: MPWC #5 (final) in Rio de JaneiroUIPM's 2009 MPWC #5 Results Page ** Individual winners: Ádám Marosi (m) / Donata Rimšaitė (f) title: 2009 in modern pentathlon
